text: Murist was a municipality of the district Broye in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. == History == Since 1981 with the formerly independent municipalities La Vounaise and Montborget, and in 1992 with Franex.Nomenklaturen – Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 4 April 2011 On 1 January 2017, the former municipalities of Bussy, Estavayer- le-Lac, Morens, Murist, Rueyres-les-Prés, Vernay and Vuissens merged into the new municipality of Estavayer.Historisiertes Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 5 January 2017 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Fribourg
title: Murist
